mapper.sql: ID_COMPARE_SQL_COLUMN AS compareSqlColumnId , COLUMN_NAME AS columnName , COLUMN_TYPE AS columnType , REFERENCE_COLUMN_NAME AS referenceColumnName , COLUMN_DESC AS columnDesc , ID_COMPARE_SQL AS compareSqlId , COMPARE_STYLE AS compareStyle , MIN_RATIO AS minRatio , MAX_RATIO AS maxRatio , CREATE_USER AS createUser , UPDATE_USER AS updateUser , CREATE_TIME AS createTime , UPDATE_TIME AS updateTime , DEL_FLAG AS delFlag
